_sText:
hi, this map permited me to try new things (again). now, i'm aware that propper models lighting suck a lot in css but work normally in csgo (it surprised me a lot). tbh, i think that everyone should learn a modeling tool if they want to do some hard detailed map. i also wanted to experiment something different for the ramp design. this caused me to have many size issue on the map (first time i encountered this type of issue, mainly related to the propper lighting issue). so, i tried to fix them in any way i could, that's why you will be able to see through the ramp on some area if you look at it from the front (basically, every curved ramp). also, my other goal was to do a map not symmetrical for once. and well, because i have no imagination for theming, i just took some pictures of d2 which reminded me good ol times, enjoy

random note for server hoster:

if you decide to zone the bonus 4, it normally ends on the very top (white ground) but if you prefer, you can choose to zone the ending on the lenny face ground

Map: tier 3-4 (depends on server), 4 stages, 4 bonuses.
b1 by not_a_zombie
b3 by kreal

Download link (css): http://gamebanana.com/maps/195942
Download link (csgo): http://gamebanana.com/maps/195943

Showcase video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nkqEJI5M91I

Credits to TopHATTwaffle and Komaokc for the assets (and all the others too).
